attributes.action: have Tony Blair tried for war crimes for what turned out to be an illegal war with Iraq, as they invaded a sovreign state, under false pretences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair lied to Parliament to persuade them to vote in favour of going to war with Iraq, in that he told them Iraq had weapons of mass destruction.
In effect Tony Blair scared the British parliament with false information, and lead Britain into what turned out to be an illegal war as there were no weapons of mass destruction.
Now he should be tried for war crimes, as  he is the cause of the loss of many lives, and the further de-stabilization of the Middle East.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
